message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $100.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me there?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I can do $92, but that's as low as I can go. It's a great deal, if I do say so myself!
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $88. I'm trying to stay within my budget, and I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $88 and $92, which is $90. I think it's a fair price, and I'm confident you'll love the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short of my budget. I'm willing to pay $89 for the product. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?

I'm glad you're still interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to give you a slight concession, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $90. I think it's a great price, and I'm confident you'll love the product.

I'm not willing to pay $90, I was thinking more along the lines of $88.50. That's as high as I'm willing to go. If you're not willing to meet me at that price, I'll have to consider buying from John for $120
